column4: Oh, and well i am here... I can install compiz, but after a reboot, metacity stops working, no window borders or menus, when i change it back to the default window manager, compiz effects stop. how do i get the two to coninside like they always used to?
And yes, i have tried #compiz, they never said a word in the 2 hours i was in there.
ooo sorry guy,,, it was probably when I was on break in #compiz
